Name: Pixel Boy: The Legend of Tain
About the game: Meet Tain, a Nesprit (Fox-Human hybrid) with a knack for exploring. Explore, fight and engage on a bite-sized adventure to help Tain find his missing friend. -A Solo adventure with multiple areas to explore! -A variety of enemies to fight and items to use! -Several Power Ups and Star Keys to find!
